title: Net profit margin of the leading 10 consumer products companies in the U.S. 2013
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Net profit margin for 10 number of Companys.
The Net profit margin is highest at Company Philip Morris International Inc. and lowest at Company Mars Inc..
The highest Company Philip Morris International Inc. has 28.3 more Net profit margin than the lowest Company Mars Inc..
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Company in the x axis and Net profit margin in the y axis.
The Net profit margin is highest at Company Philip Morris International Inc. and lowest at Company Mars Inc..
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Net profit margin for 10 number of Companys.
The Net profit margin is highest at Company Philip Morris International Inc. and lowest at Company Mars Inc..
The highest Company Philip Morris International Inc. has 28.3 more Net profit margin than the lowest Company Mars Inc..
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Net profit margin in each Company on the y axis.
Company Philip Morris International Inc. has the highest Net profit margin and Mars Inc. has the lowest Net profit margin.
The second highest Net profit margin is appeared to be the Company Apple Inc..
The highest Company Philip Morris International Inc. has 28.3 more Net profit margin than the lowest Company Mars Inc..
Company Philip Morris International Inc. is higher than any other Companys with value 28.3, followed by Apple Inc., and The Coca-Cola Company. Down to Company Mars Inc. with the lowest value 0.0.
The average Net profit margin in all 10 Companys is 12.64.
